title: Trump news live: Follow latest updates as president hints whistleblower should be executed
text:
Donald Trump has hinted that a whistleblower should be executed for exposing his attempt to pressure the Ukrainian president into investigating a major rival in the 2020 election, a revelation that led Democrats to launch an impeachment inquiry.

The US president was urged to stop his “reprehensible witness intimidation” in a joint statement by leading Democrats, after demanding to know the identity of the whistleblower – who he likened to a spy – and making the loaded remark: “You know what we used to do in the old days when we were smart with spies and treason, right?”

Mr Trump’s layer Rudy Giuliani, who is central to the allegations, has further implicated the state department in the scandal, presenting Fox News with text messages that he claims prove his meeting with an aide of Mr Zelensky was ordered by officials in Mike Pompeo’s department, not by Mr Trump.
